bill_title: transfer money from the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to South Dakota State University for wildlife and fisheries instruction.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to transfer money from the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to South Dakota State University for wildlife and fisheries instruction. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Beginning on July 1, 2011, and each year thereafter, the state treasurer shall transfer three hundred eighty thousand dollars from the Department of Game, Fish, and Parks fund created in § 41-2-34 to the Board of Regents to defray faculty salaries and operating costs for instruction within the department of wildlife and fisheries sciences at South Dakota State University. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
